content:
It's great that you're exploring more features on your Apple Watch and using the Activity app to track your daily steps and exercises.

Regarding your sleep, it's excellent that you're aware of your sleep patterns and working to establish a consistent sleep schedule and bedtime routine. Remember, small changes can add up over time, so keep up the good work!

As for tracking your menstrual cycle, that's fantastic! The Clue app is a great tool for tracking your cycle and understanding your body's rhythms. It's possible that your increased physical activity and lifestyle changes have contributed to the changes in your periods. Exercise can affect hormone levels, which can, in turn, impact menstrual cycles. However, it's essential to remember that every body is different, and there could be other factors at play as well.

Tracking your menstrual cycle can be incredibly empowering, as it helps you better understand your body and make informed decisions about your health. It's also a great way to identify patterns and potential issues, such as irregular periods, cramps, or mood changes.

Do you have any specific questions about tracking your menstrual cycle or how to use the Clue app more effectively?
